    • 构造器详细资料

      • DrawMonsters

        public DrawMonsters(Board board,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> maps,
                    Wavemangement wavemangement,
                    GameSet gameSet)
        The constructor DrawMonsters of ,Initializes a DrawMonsters object for drawing monsters and related elements.
        参数:
        board - The game board for drawing monsters.
        maps - A HashMap of images used for rendering monsters and animations.
        wavemangement - The wave management for controlling monster behavior.
        gameSet - The game settings for controlling drawing behavior.

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawheathbar

        public void drawheathbar(processing.core.PApplet app,
                         double hp,
                         double currenthp,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Draws the health bar for a monster at the specified location.
        参数:
        app - The PApplet used for drawing.
        hp - The total health points of the monster.
        currenthp - The current health points of the monster.
        x - The x-coordinate of the health bar.
        y - The y-coordinate of the health bar.

      • drawdeadmonster

        public void drawdeadmonster(processing.core.PApplet app,
                            java.util.HashMap<Monsters,java.lang.Integer> deadmonster)
        Draws death animations for monsters whose animation is in progress.
        参数:
        app - The PApplet used for drawing.
        deadmonster - A HashMap of dead monsters and their animation state.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the overall behavior of monsters, including movement, health bars, and animations.
        指定者:
        draw 在类中 DrawTool
        参数:
        app - The PApplet used for drawing.
